title: change order of glyphs in FontLab?
content:
hello everybody,

is there a way to change the order of glyphs in the font window?

thx,  
marcus
author: marcus sterz

comments.content: What do you mean exactly? Pls be more specific. Give an example.

Switch to the Index mode and use drag-and-drop, or use Glyph / Sort Glyphs. There, you can choose whether you want to automatically sort the glyphs by glyph name, by Unicode codepoint, or by the encoding selected in the Names mode.

Cheers,  
Adam
